magicbook.gtlitecore.client.renderer

接口 IHaloRenderBehavior

  • 所有超级接口:
    gregtech.api.items.metaitem.stats.IItemComponent, IItemRendererManager
    所有已知实现类:
    HaloRenderItemBehavior

    public interface IHaloRenderBehavior
extends IItemRendererManager

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      The color of Halo texture render.

      • 从接口继承的方法 magicbook.gtlitecore.client.renderer.IItemRendererManager

        onRendererRegistry

    • 方法详细资料

      • shouldDrawHalo

        boolean shouldDrawHalo()
        Check if item required render Halo texture.
        返回:
        If required render Halo texture in current situation, then return true.

      • getHaloTexture

        net.minecraft.client.renderer.texture.TextureAtlasSprite getHaloTexture()
        The mask where the halo overlay will be.
        返回:
        The masked area and extra area of halo texture will be.

      • getHaloColor

        int getHaloColor()
        The color of Halo texture render.
        返回:
        Color of the halo texture.

      • getHaloSize

        int getHaloSize()
        The size of total Halo texture renderer.
        返回:
        Renderer size of Halo texture.

      • shouldDrawPulse

        boolean shouldDrawPulse()
        Check if halo texture should draw a little dynamic pulse.
        返回:
        If required, then return true.
